column4: good morning. I am trying to install ubuntu on my emachines G725 but I can see nothing because the brightness is at 1%... anyone got an idea?
How do you know the brightness is at 1%?
i can see that there is something on the sreen
Well it's gonna be pretty difficult if you can't even get to a working terminal shell. Can you get to a tty with Ctrl+Alt+F2?
I guess. something is changing on the screen
i just startet the install from the CD
is there another way to open a terminal?
At what point in the boot phase does the screen go to 1% brightness?
well first i see this screen with the 2 icons at the buttom (some humans) after that its dark
There might be a parameter you can pass to the kernel but you'd have to do some experimenting. Try booting with 'nomodeset' or 'text' maybe
When you see the icon at the bottom, press Esc to get to the boot menu
i am in the boot menu
I believe 'e' should bring you to the screen where you can edit kernel parameters
